text: Kristen Angela Johnston (born September 20, 1967) is an American movie, stage and television program actress who won two Emmy Awards for acting. She acted as Sally Solomon in the sitcom 3rd Rock from the Sun and has been in several movies. She was born in Washington, D.C., though was raised close to Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
